alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:17PM CDT until June 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL BOX BUTTE...SOUTHEASTERN SCOTTS BLUFF AND NORTHWESTERN MORRILL COUNTIES... At 317 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Moomaws Corner, or 19 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bayard, Chimney Rock State Park, Moomaws Corner, Angora, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62, South Bayard Junction and McGrew. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
